scripts.start: npm run build && cat test.txt | node lib/pino-zen-cli.mjs --right boolean=5 --dim boolean --error error
scripts.build: rm -f lib/* && tsc && npm run build-mjs && npm run build-cli && rm lib/*.js
scripts.build-cli: npx rollup --format es --file lib/pino-zen-cli.js -- lib/pino-zen-cli.js && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > ./lib/pino-zen-cli.mjs && cat ./lib/pino-zen-cli.js >> ./lib/pino-zen-cli.mjs
scripts.build2: rm -f lib/* && tsc && npx rollup --format es --file lib/pino-zen.mjs -- lib/pino-zen.js && npx rollup --format es --file lib/pino-zen-cli.js -- lib/pino-zen-cli.js && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > ./lib/pino-zen-cli.mjs && cat ./lib/pino-zen-cli.js >> ./lib/pino-zen-cli.mjs && rm -f lib/*.js && chmod +x ./lib/pino-zen-cli.mjs
scripts.build-2: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > ./lib/pino-zen-cli.mjs && cat ./lib/pino-zen-cli.js >> ./lib/pino-zen-cli.mjs && rm -f lib/*.js && chmod +x ./lib/pino-zen-cli.mjs
